lead_paragraph: The United Methodist Church, the denomination of President Bush, implicitly criticized the American war effort today, declaring that ''violence in all of its forms and expressions is contrary to God's purpose for the world.'' The statement by the denomination's bishops referred to the Sept. 11 attacks and bioterrorism but offered no justification for the American military response.
abstract: United Methodist Church criticizes war against terrorism saying that violence in all forms 'is contrary to God's purpose for the world' (M)
